_comment2: Copy this to .vscode-node-red-tools.json and customize as needed
_comment3: Remove all _comment fields from your actual config
_flows_help: Path to flows file (relative to repo root or absolute)

plugins._enabled_help: List of plugin names to enable (empty = all enabled)
plugins._order_help: Custom plugin execution order (empty = use priority/filename)

server._username_help: Username for basic auth (optional - can use environment variable NODERED_USERNAME)
server._password_help: ⚠️  NOT RECOMMENDED - use NODERED_PASSWORD env var instead for security
server._token_help: ⚠️  NOT RECOMMENDED - use tokenFile or NODERED_TOKEN env var instead
server._tokenFile_help: Path to file containing bearer token (recommended: ~/.nodered-token)
server._verifySSL_help: Verify SSL certificates (set to false for self-signed certs in dev)
